name: Maths Kombat lll
description:
Learning maths has never been so easy! Maths Kombat III - is a perfect blend of education & game, with a vast question bank covering over 300 concepts. It caters to CBSE curriculum of 10th class Maths. Detailed analysis of performance, voice guided crisp notes ensures conceptual clarity of kids. Play Maths Kombat III to clear your fundamental concepts.

Conquer the world with your skills! Get a chance to be a part of the Super Brain Club! Speed and accuracy will help you lead the game! The faster you workout, the more rewards, scholarship & money you earn. Liberty to learn concepts at your convenience! After playing this game, you will never go back to conventional online test. Learn Maths in a gamified way and also earn rewards for the same.

Topics covered are,

Real Numbers
Polynomials
Linear Equations
Quadratic Equation
Arithmetic Progression
Triangles
Trigonometry
Coordinate Geometry
Circles
Surface Area

Additional
- Tracker to keep tab of your weak concepts & improve
- Play weekly tournaments & earn money
- Single player game with no number crunching required
